text: The results obtained in Section 3 show that coherent instabilities should not prevent
label: BODY

text: us from reaching the design intensity of 1015 circulating protons. However to reach this
label: BODY

text: goal one will have to use feedback to control the low frequency instabilities and to reduce
label: BODY

label: BODY
